description: Stores information about the market value of each collateral.

columns.name: REF_DATE
columns.description: Reference date (sometimes referred to as 'reporting date'), the last working date of the month in 'DD-MM-YYYY' format.

columns.name: COLL_ID
columns.description: The identifier of the collateral linked to the loan.

columns.name: MKT_VALUE
columns.description: The market value of the collateral.

unique.description: Combinations of REF_DATE and COLL_ID are unique.

relationships.cardinality: 1-to-many from 'collaterals' to 'transactions' for a given (REF_DATE, COLL_ID)
